code: import React from'react';import{Navigation}from'@shopify/polaris';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const NavigationComponent=_ref=>{let{selected,onSelect}=_ref;const navigate=useNavigate();const handleNavigation=(path,key)=>{onSelect(key);navigate(path);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Navigation,{location:"/",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Navigation.Section,{items:[{label:'AI Impact Score',selected:selected==='home',onClick:()=>handleNavigation('/','home')},{label:'Interview Assignments',selected:selected==='assignments',onClick:()=>handleNavigation('/interview-assignments','assignments')},{label:'Interview Analysis',selected:selected==='analysis',onClick:()=>handleNavigation('/interview-analysis','analysis')}]})});};export default NavigationComponent;
